      • convertTo

        public static Object convertTo(String raw,
               Class<?> clz)
        Converts a String value to specified type, if possible.
        Parameters:
        raw - Raw, string value, to be converted
        clz - Target type to be converted to
        Returns:
        Converted value, if converstion was possible, null otherwise
        Throws:
        NumberFormatException - If the value was not in correct format, while converting to numeric type
        RuntimeException - If the value was not in correct format, while converting to Date or Boolean type
